statements: SELECT festival_name, ticket_price FROM festival_tickets;
SELECT * FROM festival_tickets WHERE tickets_sold > 1000;
SELECT MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM festival_tickets;
SELECT festival_name, attendance FROM festival_tickets ORDER BY attendance DESC;
SELECT festival_name, revenue FROM festival_tickets WHERE ticket_price < 50 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT festival_name, ticket_price FROM festival_tickets;
SELECT * FROM festival_tickets WHERE tickets_sold > 500
SELECT festival_name, revenue FROM festival_tickets WHERE attendance >= 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT SUM(tickets_sold) AS total_tickets_sold, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM festival_tickets;
SELECT festival_id, festival_name, ticket_price FROM festival_tickets WHERE attendance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY attendance DESC, ticket_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival_tickets;
SELECT festival_name, ticket_price FROM festival_tickets WHERE ticket_quantity > 0;
SELECT ticket_id, festival_name, purchase_date FROM festival_tickets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_attendance WHERE attendance_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT attendance_id, festival_name, total_attendees, revenue FROM festival_attendance ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_tickets WHERE ticket_quantity > 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, SUM(total_attendees) AS total_attendees_count FROM festival_attendance GROUP BY festival_name;
SELECT ticket_id, festival_name, ticket_price FROM festival_tickets WHERE ticket_price >= 50 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT festival_name, attendance_date, revenue FROM festival_attendance WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival_tickets t JOIN festival_attendance a ON t.festival_name = a.festival_name WHERE t.ticket_quantity > 2 AND a.total_attendees > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT festival_id, location, total_revenue FROM festivals;
SELECT attendee_name, festival_id FROM attendees;
SELECT sale_date, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, festival_date FROM festivals WHERE total_attendance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM festivals WHERE total_attendance > 1000 ORDER BY festival_date DESC;
SELECT festival_name, location, total_revenue FROM festivals WHERE festival_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND total_revenue > 50000;

SELECT attendee_name, ticket_sales.sale_date, festivals.festival_name FROM attendees JOIN ticket_sales ON attendees.ticket_id = ticket_sales.ticket_id JOIN festivals ON attendees.festival_id = festivals.festival_id WHERE ticket_sales.ticket_price > 100 ORDER BY ticket_sales.sale_date ASC;
SELECT festival_name, location, SUM(total_attendance) AS total_attendees FROM festivals GROUP BY festival_name, location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT festival_name, location, total_revenue FROM festivals WHERE festival_id IN (SELECT festival_id FROM attendees WHERE attendee_name = 'John Doe');
SELECT * FROM festival
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM festival
SELECT location, festival_name FROM festival
SELECT * FROM ticket
SELECT ticket_type, price, quantity FROM ticket
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM festival;
SELECT ticket_type, price, quantity, sold_at, festival_id FROM ticket WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY sold_at DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, ticket_id, attendee_id, purchase_date, quantity, total_price FROM ticket_purchase WHERE total_price < 1000 AND quantity > 1;
SELECT attendee_name, email, phone FROM attendee WHERE attendee_name LIKE 'A%' AND phone IS NOT NULL;

SELECT festival.festival_name, attendee.attendee_name, ticket.purchase_date, ticket.total_price FROM festival JOIN ticket_purchase ticket ON festival.festival_id = ticket.festival_id JOIN attendee ON ticket.attendee_id = attendee.attendee_id ORDER BY ticket.purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM festival;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM festival;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer;
SELECT sale_id, quantity_sold, total_amount FROM sales;
SELECT festival_id, ticket_price, ticket_type FROM ticket;
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM festival ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT t.ticket_id, s.quantity_sold, s.total_amount FROM sales s JOIN ticket t ON s.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE s.total_amount > 1000;

SELECT f.festival_name, c.customer_name, a.arrival_time FROM festival f JOIN attendance a ON f.festival_id = a.festival_id JOIN customer c ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id ORDER BY a.arrival_time ASC;
